__e: Henri is the love of my life.
As if he's the only person named Henri.
This morning the king seemed concerned that Henri is taller and stronger.
Mind you, young man, that Henri Young is the one on trial here, not me!
Unlike many men that live much longer Henri Young did not die in vain.
The warden couldn't simply have washed his hands of Henri Young because he had absolutely no idea he was there.
